general_advisory: Keep a close eye on pest infestations and diseases in crops mentioned. Follow recommended spraying schedules and doses for effective pest management. Prune jasmine plants for better flowering.

advisory: To manage Tikka disease in groundnut, spray Chlorothalonil 75% WP or Mancozeb 75% WP or Hexaconazole 5% E.C.
Apply 87kg of DAP, 20kg of MOP, and 4-ton of FYM at the time of planting.
To control Cut worm in Potato crop, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C.
To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight disease in Onion, spray Mancozeb 75% WP or Difenoconazole 25% E.C or Tebuconazole 25.9% E.C.
To manage Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer in Late sown Cauliflower and Cabbage crops, spray Neem based Pesticide (Azadirachtin) 300 PPM.
To manage Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer in Late sown Cauliflower and Cabbage crops, spray Neem based Pesticide (Azadirachtin) 300 PPM.
To manage thrips in chilli crop, spray neem-based pesticide (Azadirachtin) 1500 PPM.
To manage Epilachna Beetle infestation in Brinjal, shake plants to dislodge grubs, pupae, and adults in a pail of kerosene mixed water.
To manage mango hoppers, spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL or Thiamethoxam 25% W.G or Acetamiprid 20% S.P.
Prune jasmine plants for better flowering.
